definition: a substance used as a coating to protect or decorate a surface (especially a mixture of pigment suspended in a liquid), color or dye with a pigment
details:
noun
- a substance used as a coating to protect or decorate a surface (especially a mixture of pigment suspended in a liquid)
= synonyms: paint
- dry coloring material (especially a powder to be mixed with a liquid to produce paint, etc.)
- any substance whose presence in plant or animal tissues produces a characteristic color
verb
- color or dye with a pigment
= example: color or dye with a pigment
- acquire pigment
